definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Instead it shows that negative in the cell membrane, the Sheng.
sentences.chinese: 反之則表明陰性在細胞膜外過盛。

sentences.english: If we minimize rise time we increase overshoot, and viceversa.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們減少上升時間，也就增加了過沖，反之亦然。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the latter expresses sex by way of love.
sentences.chinese: 後者通過情來表達性，其狀態反之。

sentences.english: Instead of running away from the problem, we are facing reality as it is.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有逃避問題，反之我是如實地正視實相。

sentences.english: Conversely , you can also point forum readers to the main pages of your site.
sentences.chinese: 反之，你也可以點論壇讀者主要頁你的站點。

sentences.english: And vice-a-versa, all at the perfect pace.
sentences.chinese: 反之亦然，一切都以完美的步調進行。

sentences.english: The GGT peak value appeared early was good prognosis, contrarily was bad.
sentences.chinese: GGT升高峯值出現早的預後較好，反之差。

sentences.english: Instead, the online materials appear to be only whetting appetites for more.
sentences.chinese: 反之，似乎是唯一的網上資料更助長饅頭。

sentences.english: Energy transmutes into matter and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 能量變成物質，反之亦然。

sentences.english: Scrolling past the last item will take you to the first item in the list and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 則滾過最後一項後將到達列表的第一項，反之亦然。

sentences.english: Europe seems farther away to the U. S. and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: “歐洲似乎離美國漸遠，反之宜然”。

sentences.english: The one controlling the results of the other, and viceversa.
sentences.chinese: 一方掌控着另一方的結果，反之亦然。

sentences.english: On the contrary, a risk is some condition that adds to project variance.
sentences.chinese: 反之，風險是向項目方差中加入的某個條件。

sentences.english: The more you select, the more proposals you will be alerted to and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 選擇的越多，您將收到越多提案的通知，反之亦然。

sentences.english: Adding yolk to a little egg was a recipe for a female.
sentences.chinese: 反之，往小蜥蜴卵中添加卵黃，他們孵出了雌性蜥蜴。

sentences.english: Where light is – there is no place for shadow and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 有光的地方就無影，反之亦然。

definition: Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
